definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: I'm one hundred percent sure he's falling in love with you.
sentences.chinese: 我百分之百肯定他爱上了你。

sentences.english: Action figures and games & puzzles saw increases of four per cent and one per cent.
sentences.chinese: 动画人物和游戏及拼图看到了百分之百分之一4增加。

sentences.english: For the first time, we’ve begun screening 100 percent of southbound rail shipments.
sentences.chinese: 我们首次开始对南去的铁路运输实行百分之百的检查。

sentences.english: Try 100 percent pomegranate juice from Pom Wonderful.
sentences.chinese: 请尝试百分之百的石榴汁，不额外添加糖分。

sentences.english: The physical body is well over go per cent pure space.
sentences.chinese: 肉体是超过百分之百纯净空间的流溢。

sentences.english: A 100 percent treehouses would take years to create.
sentences.chinese: 座百分之百旳树屋需要用几年旳时间来创造。

sentences.english: Just over 200 years ago Kooris made up 100% of the population.
sentences.chinese: 还是在200年以前，古利人占人口的百分之百。

sentences.english: Always give a hundred percent, and you'll never have to second guess yourself.
sentences.chinese: 玉于百分之百确定自几，这样你就再也不会怀疑自几。

sentences.english: I won't say too much but it was clearly 100 per cent for money.
sentences.chinese: 我不会说太多，但他显然百分之百的是冲钱去的。

sentences.english: Every person who says this is 100% correct.
sentences.chinese: 每一位这么说的人都是百分之百对的。

sentences.english: However, one hundred percent Italian origin of Panerai is an exception.
sentences.chinese: 然而，百分之百意大利血统的沛纳海却是一个例外。

sentences.english: Sugar-sweetened beverages and even one hundred percent fruit juices were also associated with weight gain.
sentences.chinese: 含糖饮料，甚至百分之百的果汁也与体重增加有关。

sentences.english: Decoration materials, transparent and reasonable prices, allows customers one hundred percent satisfaction.
sentences.chinese: 装饰材料价格透明合理，让客户百分之百满意。

sentences.english: Why, yes, I did, auntie—certain sure.
sentences.chinese: 那还用说，我吻了，姨妈，百分之百的肯定。

sentences.english: Set appointments. Show your partner that you are willing to listen one hundred percent.
sentences.chinese: 约会，展示出你们这一对愿意百分之百聆听对方。

definition: a tiny bit/very little/next to nothing (idiom)
only if (..., or otherwise, ...)/only when/only in the case that/unless
to be convinced/to be sure/to firmly believe/to be positive that/definite news
guarantee/to guarantee/to ensure/to safeguard/to pledge/CL:個|个[ge4]
